author: Aubrey
title: Whiskey Pecan Pie
ingredients: 1 cup corn syrup (light or dark) (Karo® or other brand)
1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract or vanilla bean paste
1 cup whipped cream topping or ice cream (optional)
1 cup corn syrup (light or dark) (Karo® or other brand)
1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract or vanilla bean paste
1 cup whipped cream topping or ice cream (optional)

instructions_list: Mix corn syrup, eggs, sugar, butter, whiskey, vanilla and salt using a spoon or a rubber spatula.
Pour the mixture into pie crust.
Bake on center rack of oven for 55-70 minutes or until the center has just a slight jiggle but the edges are stable and set.
Note: If piecrust is over-browning, cover edges with foil.
Cool completely on wire rack before slicing.
Optional: Add whipped cream topping or ice cream. Pre-soak 1/3 of pecans in whiskey and layer on top of whiskey pecan pie. Lightly sprinkle white sugar on top.
description: Embrace the joy of the holiday season with the perfect blend of Southern charm and festive flavors in Whiskey Pecan Pie. Enjoy the sweet, buttery goodness of traditional pecan pie with a delightful hint of whiskey or bourbon's warmth and complexity. It's an ideal treat for Fall and Thanksgiving festivities and Christmas celebration.
